document.masterDocTitle: Nine new species of genus Homoneura from Qinling mountains in China (Diptera: Lauxaniidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Nine new species of genus Homoneura from Qinling mountains in China (Diptera: Lauxaniidae)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: College of Agronomy, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, Hohhot 010019, China
College of Agronomy, Inner Mongolia Agricultural University, Hohhot 010019, China

subSubSection.paragraph:
1.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) acutata Yang, Zhu & Hu, 1999
. Oriental: China ( Henan ).

2.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) anadaequata
sp. nov.
Palearctic: China ( Shaanxi (Zhouzhi County)); Oriental: China ( Shaanxi (Foping County)).

3.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) brevis Gao & Yang, 2004
. Oriental: China ( Guangxi ).

4.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) bicolorata
sp. nov.
Palearctic: China ( Shaanxi (Hua County)).

5.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) bispinalis Yang, Hu & Zhu, 2001
. Oriental: China ( Yunnan , Zhejiang ).

6.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
caoi Wang & Yang, 2012. Oriental: China ( Sichuan ).

7.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) chinensis Malloch, 1926
. Palearctic: China ( Shaanxi (Hua County, Zhouzhi County)); Oriental: China ( Sichuan , Shaanxi (Foping County, Zhashui County)).

8.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) curvata Yang, Zhu & Hu, 1999
. Oriental: China ( Henan ).

9.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) curvispina Gao & Yang, 2003
. Palaearctic: China ( Tibet ).

10.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) curvispinosa Yang, Hu & Zhu, 2001
. Oriental: China ( Zhejiang ).

11.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
dadongshanica Shi & Yang, 2014. Oriental: China ( Guangdong ).

12.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) dagupingensis
sp. nov.
Oriental: China ( Shaanxi (Foping County)).

13.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
denticulata Shi & Yang, 2014. Oriental: China ( Guangdong )..

14.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) fujianensis Yang, Zhu & Hu, 2003
. Oriental: China ( Fujian ).

15.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) grandis (Kertész, 1915)
. Oriental: China ( Taiwan) , Vietnam .

16.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) guizhouensis Gao &Yang, 2002
. Oriental: China ( Guizhou ).

17.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) henanensis Yang, Zhu & Hu, 1999
. Palearctic: China ( Shaanxi (Hua County, Xi’an City)); Oriental: China ( Beijing , Henan , Shaanxi (Foping County, Ningshan County, Zhashui County)).

18.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) hirayamae (Matsumura, 1916)
. Palaearctic: China ( Tianjin ), Japan (Honshu).

19.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
jiangxiensis Shi, Gao & Shen, 2017. Oriental: China ( Jiangxi ).

20.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
kuankuoshuiensis Wang & Yang, 2012. Oriental: China ( Guizhou ).

21.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) longiacutata
sp. nov.
Oriental: China ( Shaanxi (Foping County, Ningshan County)).

22.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) longicurva
sp. nov.
Palearctic: China ( Shaanxi (Hua County)); Oriental: China ( Shaanxi (Foping County)).

23.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) longispina Gao & Yang, 2004
. Oriental: China ( Guangxi ).

24.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) miaoae
sp. nov.
Oriental: China ( Shaanxi (Foping County, Yang County)).

25.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
martini Shi, Gao & Shen, 2017. Oriental: China ( Jiangxi ).

26.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
pangae Shi, Gao & Shen, 2017. Oriental: China ( Jiangxi , Zhejiang ).

27.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) platimarginata
sp. nov.
Oriental: China ( Shaanxi (Foping County, Liuba County)).

28.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
pseudograndis (Papp & Gaimari, 2013). Oriental: China ( Guangdong , Taiwan) .

29.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) serrata Gao & Yang, 2002
. Oriental: China ( Guangxi , Guizhou ).

30.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
simigrandis Shi & Yang, 2014. Oriental: China ( Guangdong ).

31.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) similicurvata
sp. nov.
Palearctic: China ( Shaanxi (Xi’an City)); Oriental: China ( Shaanxi (Foping County, Feng County)).

32.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) spectabilis
sp. nov.
Oriental: China ( Shaanxi (Foping County)).

33.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
stepheni Shi, Gao & Shen, 2017. Oriental: China ( Jiangxi ).

34.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) tianeensis Gao & Yang, 2004
. Oriental: China ( Guangxi ).

35.
Homoneura ( Homoneura )
tianjingshanica Shi & Yang, 2014. Oriental: China ( Guangdong ).

36.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) tianmushana Yang, Hu & Zhu, 2001
. Palearctic: China ( Shaanxi (Zhouzhi County)); Oriental: China ( Zhejiang , Shaanxi (Foping County)).

37.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) yangi Gao & Yang, 2005
. Oriental: China ( Guizhou ).

38.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) yaromi Yang, Hu & Zhu, 2001
. Oriental: China ( Zhejiang ).

39.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) zhangjiajiensis Shi & Yang, 2014
. Oriental: China ( Hunan )..

40.
Homoneura ( Homoneura ) zonalis Yang, Zhu &Hu, 1999
. Palearctic: China ( Shaanxi (Zhouzhi County, Yulin City)); Oriental: China ( Henan ).
